comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suwa%C5%82ki in northeast Poland. "Finally in 1915, the Germans broke the Russian front and Suwałki was put under German occupation. The town and surrounding areas were detached from the rest of the Polish lands and were directly administered by the German military commander of the Ober-Ost Army. "
